AsphaltRoads.label: 使用 "Bio Industries" 的物品
AsphaltRoads.description: 如果 "Bio Industries" 存在，改变沥青的制作方法：在这种情况下，需要碎石而不是石砖。

AsphaltPaving.label: 使用 "Bio Industries" 的物品
AsphaltPaving.description: 如果 "Bio Industries" 存在，改变沥青的制作方法：在这种情况下，需要碎石而不是石砖。

AsphaltRoads.label: 使用 "Wood Gasification" 的物品
AsphaltRoads.description: Changes the crafting recipe for asphalt if "Wood Gasification" is present: In this case, tar is required instead of crude oil.

AsphaltPaving.label: 使用 "Wood Gasification" 的物品
AsphaltPaving.description: Changes the crafting recipe for asphalt if "Wood Gasification" is present: In this case, tar is required instead of crude oil.

AsphaltRoads.label: Simplified research
AsphaltRoads.description: If checked, researching asphalt will no longer require production science packs.

AsphaltPaving.label: Simplified research
AsphaltPaving.description: If checked, researching asphalt will no longer require production science packs.

AsphaltRoads.label: Item group of asphalt tiles
AsphaltRoads.description: The selected item group contains all asphalt related recipies. By default, the recipies will be displayed in the logistics tab.

AsphaltPaving.label: Item group of asphalt tiles
AsphaltPaving.description: The selected item group contains all asphalt related recipies. By default, the recipies will be displayed in the logistics tab.

AsphaltRoads.label: Stack size of asphalt tiles
AsphaltRoads.description: Default stack size is 100 items.\nMaximum value: 1000\nMinimum value: 10

AsphaltPaving.label: Stack size of asphalt tiles
AsphaltPaving.description: Default stack size is 100 items.\nMaximum value: 1000\nMinimum value: 10
